resources.string: Replace previous Home screen and settings
Not enough cloud storage space to back up items from this device. Tap to view cloud storage options available to you.
Not enough cloud storage space to back up WeChat data. Upgrade your storage plan to back up items.
Grant the required permissions to back up items
Not enough cloud storage left to save this backup. Upgrade your plan or free up cloud storage space.
Not enough storage space. Free up storage first.
Grant the required permissions in Settings to back up items
Check your network settings and try again
Backed up Home screen apps, system settings, etc.
Current backup will overwrite the previous one. Tap to view.
"Can't back up. Not enough storage space."
Personal data and previously installed apps will appear on your device automatically

"These items will be backed up to Xiaomi Cloud when your device is connected to Wi-Fi: * Apps, Home screen layout, and wallpapers * Alarm, clock, and time settings * Notification settings * MIUI and system settings Note: Data for apps you've installed won't be backed up to Xiaomi Cloud."

"These items will be backed up to Xiaomi Cloud when your device is connected to Wi-Fi: * Apps, Home screen layout, and wallpapers * Alarm, clock, and time settings * Notification settings * MIUI and system settings Note: Data for apps you've installed won't be backed up to Xiaomi Cloud."
Get more storage space, daily backups, and more.
"You can now back up your device's Home screen layout, apps, system settings, and WeChat data. Tap to learn more. "
"Back up your device's Home screen layout, app list, and system settings. Tap to learn more."
Create Xiaomi Cloud backups automatically when connected to Wi-Fi.
Requires connection to Wi-Fi, power ≥%s, and locked screen
For backing up and restoring Home screen apps
Access the list of apps installed on this device
Found a backup in Xiaomi Cloud
Access phone number and device status
For cloud backup of Home screen layout, app data, and app settings
"Stop restoring from %s and delete this backup? You can't reverse this action."
"Stop %s and delete this backup? You can't reverse this action."
"WeChat is already installed on this device. Can't restore WeChat data."
Your Home screen will be relaunched. Backed up apps will be downloaded automatically.

"Welcome to Cloud backup! You can use this app to back up your Home screen layout, apps, system settings, and WeChat data to the cloud. Make sure you're using the latest version to be able to take advantage of all our features."
For backing up and restoring apps
For backing up and restoring items
This feature needs to access app usage data to be able to estimate the size of WeChat backups.
Give Backup \"Usage access\" permission in the Settings to be able to back up items.
Toggling the switch will terminate ongoing backups.
This backup requires %1$s of free cloud storage space. Upgrade your storage plan to back up items.
The data already uploaded will be lost if you cancel the backup. Cancel anyway?
The data already restored will be retained if you stop restoring. Stop restoring now?
To be able to back up automatically, grant this app permission in Settings to access the list of apps installed on your device, and select Always allow.
Local backup is different from the one in Xiaomi Cloud. If you continue, current backup will overwrite the previous one.
Restoring backups requires connecting to Wi-Fi.
Restoring backups requires connecting to Wi-Fi.

You can now back up WeChat conversations and other data to Xiaomi Cloud. To be able to back up your items, make sure you have enough cloud storage space, and that this device is locked, has over %s battery, and is connected to Wi-Fi at night. You can also back up manually at any time.

You can now back up WeChat conversations and other data to Xiaomi Cloud. To be able to back up your items, make sure you have enough cloud storage space, and that this device is locked, has over %s battery, and is connected to Wi-Fi at night. You can also back up manually at any time.
"WeChat data won't be backed up the next time you use cloud backup if you turn this feature off. This might result in data loss. Turn off WeChat backups now?"
"Looks like you haven't backed up WeChat data before"
"Couldn't complete action. Wait a minute or two and try again…"
Note: WeChat data might not be restored due to compatibility issues in some cases.
Manage and restore backed up data
"If you don't grant permissions for \"%s\", you won't receive timely notifications about unsuccessful backups and other important actions. You can grant this permission in Settings."
Items are being restored from Xiaomi Cloud. Cancel now?
"Couldn't restore items from Xiaomi Cloud. Try again."

"If you restore this backup, your Home screen will reset, and your apps will be downloaded and installed automatically.
Backup size: %s"
If you proceed to restore these items, mobile data will be used for downloading.
"%s of files will be downloaded."
Not signed in to Xiaomi Account.
"Backing up all WeChat data will use large amounts of storage very quickly. If storage is insufficient, your data won't be backed up to the cloud and may be lost. Turn on anyway?"
"Can't restore items in PC mode. Turn off PC mode and try again."
Restore more items in the background
"Test network and try again. Backups aren't available when your device is offline."

"If you restore your Home screen layout and settings, apps that are already installed will be restored to their original positions on the Home screen. Apps that aren't part of this backup will be moved to the last page of the Home screen."
Found a Xiaomi Cloud backup for this device. Restore Home screen apps and settings or use it as a new device and erase previous Xiaomi Cloud backups?
You can now back up WeChat data. Tap for details.
For sending notifications about cloud backups
Grant permissions to send notifications and reminders to be able to enjoy all the services that Cloud backup has to offer.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
Chat history, files, and other items (%s)
Uninstall WeChat to be able to restore WeChat data
Not enough storage space. Free up storage first.
Network error. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Restored Home screen apps, system settings, etc.
Transfer from your old device using Mi Mover
"Before you restore WeChat data, make sure that WeChat isn't installed on this device. While the data restores, don't open or use WeChat."
Paused to save mobile data. Tap to resume.
"Couldn't back up WeChat data. Try backing up manually."
Grant the required permissions to be able to use this feature. You can do so in Settings > Apps > Permissions > Cloud backup. Open Settings now?
Get a Xiaomi Cloud services membership to enjoy more cloud storage space and other perks. Purchase now?
This backup requires at least %s of available storage. Clear some space on your device and try again.
Grant the required permissions to be able to use this feature. When prompted, select \"Always allow\". Open Settings now?
Server is busy. Try backing up manually.
Manual backup required for these devices
Backing up Home screen layout and system settings…
This app needs permission to access app usage stats. You can grant this permission in Settings.
This backup needs at least %s of cloud storage.
Insufficient cloud storage. Upgrade your storage space and try again.
This backup needs at least %s of internal storage.
At least %s is required to restore items.
Insufficient internal storage. Clear storage and try again.
To be able to back up automatically, grant this app permission in Settings to access the list of apps installed on your device, and select Always allow.
Local backup is different from the one in Xiaomi Cloud. If you continue, current backup will overwrite the previous one. Overwrite now?
"Make sure WeChat isn't installed on this device before restoring items. Don't open or use WeChat while the data is being restored."
Restoring Home screen layout and system settings…
Preparing to back up. This will take %1$d-%2$d minutes.
Preparing to restore. This will take %1$d-%2$d minutes.
Back up apps to Xiaomi Cloud
Turned on backups for Home screen apps
Backed up WeChat data. Tap for details.
Fifth day of Chinese New Year
Fourth day of Chinese New Year
Second day of Chinese New Year
Seventh day of Chinese New Year
Sixth day of Chinese New Year
Third day of Chinese New Year
Using current connection for downloading files
"Backup is almost finished and can't be canceled"
Update to the latest system version.
